summary: Encapsulates the configurable parameters and settings required to run a multi‑task transcription pipeline, allowing internal components to access and adjust options such as task selection, model behavior, and processing thresholds.
business_intent: Provides a centralized, extensible configuration object that enables developers to tailor multi‑task speech transcription services (e.g., speech‑to‑text, speaker diarization, language detection) to specific product requirements, improving flexibility and maintainability of the transcription solution.
